headline: Verisk forecasts 2025 profit below estimates on high interest cost
summary: Verisk Analytics on Wednesday forecast its 2025 adjusted profit below Wall Street estimates amid higher interest expenses, sending the data analytics firm's shares down 3.1%. WHY IT'S IMPORTANT Property and casualty (P&C) insurers have been facing higher losses due to claims triggered by extreme weather events around the world, prompting them to use analytics to help evaluate underwriting risks. In January, AccuWeather forecast total economic losses from the Los Angeles wildfires to range between $135 billion and $150 billion.

headline: Verisk CEO Lee Shavel Appointed to Federal Advisory Committee on Insurance

FACI provides advice and recommendations to assist the Federal Insurance Office (FIO) within the U.S. Department of the Treasury in carrying out its duties and authorities in monitoring the insurance industry. headline: Insider Sale: Chief Accounting Officer David Grover Sells Shares of Verisk Analytics Inc (VRSK)
summary: David Grover, the Chief Accounting Officer of Verisk Analytics Inc (NASDAQ:VRSK), executed a sale of 6,417 shares of the company on August 29, 2024, according to a recent SEC filing.  Verisk Analytics Inc (NASDAQ:VRSK) is a leading data analytics and risk assessment firm that provides predictive analytics and decision support solutions to customers in insurance, energy markets, and financial services.  Over the past year, David Grover has sold a total of 12,898 shares of Verisk Analytics Inc and has not made any purchases of the stock.
